settings.title: Best Electrolyte Drink for Your Daily Hydration Needs
settings.text:
Stay effortlessly hydrated by adding the latest innovation in electrolyte supplements to your daily routine.

When it comes to daily hydration, not all electrolytes are created equal. Supercharge your hydration like never before with Buoy’s uniquely unflavored, sugar-free, and bioavailable hydration drops. Designed for the movers, the shakers, and everyone in between.
settings.text_bottom:
What Makes The Perfect Electrolyte Drink

Common Electrolyte Options And Their Flaws

Our Electrolyte Solution for Optimal Hydration

How Buoy Complements Every Lifestyle

Easy Ways To Incorporate Buoy Into Your Daily Routine

Plus, a sneak peek of our favorite electrolyte drink that takes your everyday hydration to the next level!

settings.title: Purposefully Unflavored
settings.subtitle: NO SUGAR, SWEETENERS, FLAVORS
settings.text: Take full control over your diet with electrolytes that won't break your fast, change your metabolic state or cause inflammation with sweet and inflammatory ingredients.

settings.title: Harvested, Not Manufactured
settings.subtitle: VEGAN & NONGMO
settings.text: Buoy harvests its electrolytes and minerals from pristine marine areas in the South of France for all-natural hydration.

settings.title: 3x More Bioavailable
settings.subtitle: LIQUID FORM FACTOR
settings.text: Buoy's innovative form factor delivers vital electrolytes and minerals in their most bioavailable form that gets to work quickly at the cellular level.

settings.title: On-The-Go Electrolytes
settings.subtitle: 40 SERVINGS PER 2OZ BOTTLE
settings.text: Carry a week's worht of electrolytes in your pocket. Buoy's TSA Approved squeeze bottle is the most portable electrolyte solution.

settings.title: Sustainably Hydrate
settings.subtitle: NO SINGLE SERVING PLASTICS
settings.text:
The hydration industry is literally littered with single serving plastcs. We changed that.

✅ Post-Consumer (PCR) Bottles
✅ Less Materials Per Serving
✅ Free Carbon Neutral Shipping
✅ 100% Biodegradable Refill Mailers

settings.title: The Quest for the Best Electrolyte Drink
settings.text:
In a world that never stops moving, the importance of staying hydrated can't be overstated. Whether you're an athlete pushing the limits, a busy professional juggling meetings and deadlines, or simply someone who enjoys kicking back with a good book, everyone can benefit from optimal hydration. But let's face it—not all electrolyte drinks meet the mark.

The quest for the ideal electrolyte solution is a universal one, but the market is flooded with options that often miss the boat. Some are overloaded with sugar, effectively negating any hydration benefits. Others taste like you're licking a salt block. And let's not even talk about those with ingredients you can't pronounce.
settings.text_bottom:
That's where Buoy comes in, standing leagues above the rest. We offer a superior electrolyte drink that hits every checkmark:

✓ Efficacy
✓ Taste
✓ Ease Of Use
✓ Versatility

No more choosing between taste and health, or deciphering a laundry list of ingredients. With Buoy, you get uncompromised, all-around hydration designed to cater to every lifestyle and need.

settings.title: 🎯Efficacy
settings.text: An electrolyte drink should do what it promises—hydrate you effectively. Your body loses essential minerals like sodium, potassium, and magnesium when you sweat, and an excellent electrolyte drink will replenish these vital nutrients quickly.

settings.title: 😋Taste
settings.text: Let's be honest; no one wants to drink something that tastes like a science experiment. An ideal electrolyte solution should be palatable or even better—tasteless, allowing you to add it to any beverage without affecting the original flavor.

settings.title: 🙌Ease of Use
settings.text: Who has time for complicated mixing ratios and additional utensils? The best electrolyte drinks are those that can be effortlessly incorporated into your daily routine. A light squeeze should be all it takes to turn your ordinary drink into a hydration powerhouse.

settings.title: 💡Versatility
settings.text:
Hydration needs vary depending on the individual and situation. Whether you're an athlete needing a quick performance boost or someone trying to improve your daily water intake, an excellent electrolyte drink is versatile enough to suit various lifestyles and scenarios.

Buoy checks all these boxes, making it the go-to electrolyte drink for those who don't want to compromise on their hydration needs. It's not just about drinking more; it's about drinking smarter.

settings.title: What Defines an Excellent Electrolyte Drink
settings.subtext: When it comes to electrolyte drinks, “good enough” just doesn't cut it. You deserve something that performs exceptionally well on several fronts. So, what criteria should an electrolyte drink meet to be considered excellent?

settings.title: 🍬The Sugary Trap
settings.text: First up, let's talk about the elephant in the room—sugar. While a sugary drink might promise to boost your energy and keep you hydrated, the reality is a little less sweet. Excess sugar can lead to energy crashes and, ironically, dehydration, not to mention long-term health risks like obesity and diabetes.

settings.title: 🎨The Artificial Abyss
settings.text: If it's not sugar, it's artificial sweeteners and flavors—another pitfall in common electrolyte drink options. Sure, that neon-blue beverage might look enticing, but artificial additives do nothing for your hydration and can even have negative effects on your overall well-being.

settings.title: 🐎The One-Trick Ponies
settings.text: Some electrolyte drinks might excel in one area—like taste or quick hydration—but fall short in others. Maybe they boost your energy temporarily but are inconvenient to carry around. Or perhaps they taste great but offer limited efficacy, making you question if it's any better than regular water.

settings.title: 😐Limited Efficacy
settings.text:
Last but not least, many common electrolyte drinks offer a limited range of electrolytes and minerals, making them less effective for full-spectrum hydration. In simpler terms, they don't bring much to the table when you need a balanced intake of essentials to truly recharge.

And that's why Buoy is different. We're not just another electrolyte drink; we're a holistic hydration solution that addresses all these pitfalls, offering a sugar-free, hassle-free, and highly effective way to keep your body in balance.

settings.title: ✅ Sugar Free Hydration
settings.text:
High sugar counts, especially from processed forms, can mitigate effective hydration and physical performance with long-term use.

While you can make the case for a tiny amount of glucose for hydration, Buoy's sugar-free electrolyte drops are packed with sodium co-transporters like potassium and B vitamins that help your body absorb sodium faster than it normally would.

settings.title: Hydration Drops
settings.text:
3 BOTTLES 120 SERVINGS

The easiest and healthiest way to get your hydrating electrolytes and minerals in without the sugar, sweeteners or flavors.

✓ One Month Supply
✓ No sugar, sweeteners, flavors or artificial ingredients
✓ Hydrate for less than $1/day + 100% Money Back Guarantee

Boost Your Daily Hydration - $30 $39

settings.title: Navigating Through Common Electrolyte Drink Options
settings.text_bottom: When it comes to hydration, the options seem endless. A quick stroll down the beverage aisle or a quick search online, and you're bombarded with a kaleidoscope of colors, flavors, and brand names all promising to quench your thirst and recharge your body. But how do you sift through the marketing hype to find what truly works?

settings.title: Presenting Buoy: A Revolution in Electrolyte Drinks
settings.text:
Meet Buoy: not just another drop in the ocean of electrolyte drinks but a tidal wave of change. We heard you. You're tired of choosing between taste and health, convenience and efficacy. That's why we designed Buoy—an unparalleled, potent, sugar-free electrolyte solution that's making waves in the industry.

Clean & Pure For Optimal Hydration:

✓ 0 Sugar
✓ 0 Calories & Carbs
✓ 0 Sweeteners, Flavors
✓ Deep Ocean Electrolytes
✓ 87+ Ionic Trace Minerals
✓ Energy-Boosting B Vitamin Complex

settings.title: Why Buoy Qualifies as the Best Electrolyte Drink Option
settings.text:
When it comes to daily hydration, the choices are plenty but the truly remarkable options are few. So why settle for less when you can go for the best? Here's the breakdown of why Buoy is in a league of its own.

🎯Potency with a Purpose

When we say potent, we mean business. Loaded with 87 ionic trace minerals, essential vitamins, and a carefully balanced blend of electrolytes, Buoy ensures you stay fully charged and optimally hydrated. We're talking full-spectrum hydration that keeps you at your peak, whether you're running a marathon or watching a Netflix marathon.

🚫Freedom from Sugar

Let's face it, no one needs more sugar in their lives. We've nixed the sweet stuff without compromising on performance. With Buoy, you hydrate smarter, not harder, allowing you to focus on living your best life, sugar-free and carefree.

🍃Understated Yet Unforgettable

Who says powerful has to be flashy? We've stripped away the artificial flavors and colors, leaving you with an unflavored and transparent solution that effortlessly complements any beverage. Want to add it to your morning coffee? Go for it. Your post-workout shake? Absolutely. Even your evening cocktail? Why not!

In short, Buoy is more than a product—it's a movement. A shift away from the loud, sugary, one-trick-pony drinks of yesterday, and toward a future of straightforward, effective, all-day hydration. Welcome aboard, your better hydration journey starts now.

Buoy checks all these boxes, making it the go-to electrolyte drink for those who don't want to compromise on their hydration needs. It's not just about drinking more; it's about drinking smarter.

settings.section_title:
What Defines an Excellent Electrolyte Drink

When it comes to daily hydration, the choices are plenty but the truly remarkable options are few. So why settle for less when you can go for the best? Here's the breakdown of why Buoy is in a league of its own.

settings.suptext:
In a world where one-size-fits-all rarely ever fits, Buoy shines as the quintessential hydration companion adaptable to every lifestyle. Here's how Buoy seamlessly blends into different walks of life, elevating hydration without ever skipping a beat:

📈The Busy Professional

Meet Jake, a consultant always on the move. Jet lag and long meetings used to dehydrate him until he discovered Buoy. A quick squeeze into his morning coffee and afternoon tea keeps him alert and hydrated, ready to tackle any challenge.

🏋️‍♀️The Fitness Enthusiast

Ashley, a dedicated CrossFitter, used to struggle with muscle cramps. Adding Buoy to her water bottle has not only enhanced her hydration but also improved her performance and recovery. Now, she can focus on setting new personal records, not rehydrating.

👨‍👩‍👧The Parent On-the-Go

Juggling school runs, errands, and work leaves little time for mindful hydration. Emma, a busy mom, loves how Buoy fits into her chaotic schedule. A squeeze into her iced latte or the family’s juice ensures everyone stays hydrated without any fuss.

📚The College Student

Tim used to survive on energy drinks and coffee, leading to inevitable crashes. Buoy has been a game-changer. It effortlessly infuses into his study beverages, enhancing focus without the sugar highs and lows.

🧘‍♀️The Wellness Guru

Maya, a wellness coach, recommends Buoy to her clients for its 87 ionic trace minerals and vitamins. For her, Buoy represents holistic wellness—a simple way to balance hydration while practicing mindfulness.

🏄‍♂️The Adventure Junkie

Rock climbing, surfing, you name it—Chris is all about the adrenaline. He was on a constant quest for effective hydration that could keep up with his adventures. Buoy’s portability and quick action fit right into his on-the-go lifestyle.

Whether you're clocking in extra hours at work or chasing sunsets on a mountain, Buoy makes sure your hydration game is on point, without adding unnecessary sugars or flavors.

settings.title: ☕Morning Joe with a Twist
settings.text: Coffee may be your go-to morning elixir, but it's no secret it can be dehydrating. A quick squeeze of Buoy can turn your cup of joe into a hydrating powerhouse. Now, that's how you start the day off right!

settings.title: 🏋️‍♀️Workout Wonder
settings.text: Do you hit the gym or trail for your daily dose of endorphins? Ditch the sugary sports drinks, and add Buoy to your water bottle. Trust us; your muscles will thank you.

settings.title: 🍹Midday Mocktails
settings.text: Feeling that midday slump? Create a refreshing mocktail with club soda, a splash of lemon, and a squeeze of Buoy. It's like a tropical vacation in a glass, minus the sugar and calories.

settings.title: 🍓Smoothie Boost
settings.text: If smoothies are your jam, adding Buoy will only make them better. Buoy’s 87 ionic trace minerals and vitamins will elevate your smoothie game to pro levels. Blend it up!

settings.title: 🍵Evening Wind-Down
settings.text: As the day comes to an end, perhaps you unwind with herbal tea or even a glass of wine. A squirt of Buoy in either will ensure you stay hydrated while you relax and recharge for another day.

settings.title: 💦Anytime, Anywhere
settings.text: And let's not forget, Buoy is so versatile, you can literally add it to any drink, hot or cold. Keep a bottle in your bag, your car, or your office desk. Whenever you sip, give it a squeeze.

So there you have it—effortless, yet effective ways to incorporate Buoy into your day, ensuring you stay hydrated and refreshed no matter what's on the agenda. Ready to make Buoy your daily hydration wingman?

settings.text: "Enter Buoy hydration drops, the easy-to-use formula that’s designed to give you a big boost of the electrolytes and trace minerals that you need every day to feel your best."
“Best electrolytes for daily use"
"It's purposefully unflavored which means sugar-free, stevia, and sweetener-free"
“Buoy Daily Wellness Drops will be your latest obsession.”

settings.title: Sports Drink 👎
settings.text:
Despite the billions of dollars sports drinks have spent on marketing, they fall short for being a go-to electrolyte solution for daily use.

❌ Processed Salt — Sports drinks use cheaply manufactured sodium sources like sodium bicarbonate and sodium chloride that contain an FDA-approved amount of anti-caking agents and bleaching compounds.

❌ High Sugar — Excessive sugar intake mitigates effective hydration and undermines optimal electrolyte function in our bodies, leading to chronic inflammation with consistent use.

❌ Artificial Ingredients — Sports drinks are loaded with artificial colors, flavors and other additives that negatively impact our health, well-being and hydration.

settings.title: Electrolyte Drink 👍
settings.text:
Make an electrolyte drink at home with supplements like Buoy that are specifically formulated for hydration and muscle cramp prevention.

✅ Real Sea Salt — Buoy's hand harvested sea salt is loaded with naturally-occurring electrolytes and 87 trace minerals for a robust hydration profile that stops muscle cramps in their tracks.

✅ No Sugar or Sweeteners — These sweet and inflammatory ingredients work against electrolyte function in the long run.

✅ All-Natural Hydration — Buoy preserves its electrolytes and minerals in their naturally ionically charged states for fast-absorption.

settings.title: Electrolyte Drinks vs. Sports Drinks
settings.text: WHICH IS BETTER?

settings.title: Dr. Lianli Li, Ph.D.
settings.title_location: President Gateway Pharmaceutical, St. Louis, Missouri
settings.content: “Most of us are living our lives under the optimal hydration level. Buoy gives consumers the proper hydration they need, without having to reach for a sugary, artificial sports drink.”

settings.title: Martha Rosenau
settings.content: “My patients with gastrointestinal disease are truly benefiting from Buoy. They are feeling more vibrant and energetic with this amazing blend of electrolytes. Since it’s free of both sugars and zero-calorie sweetener, it’s the perfect way to rehydrate without further aggravating the gastrointestinal tract. Thank you for creating a dietitian’s dream - the perfectly balanced electrolyte replenisher, free of any form of sweetener.”

settings.title: Melissa Nohr, JD, BCHHP, CBNP
settings.content: “I was diagnosed with POTS a year ago and they make a point to help make daily hydration easier and more accessible to those with chronic illnesses. After using Buoy for one year as a customer, I asked to personally invest in the company.”

settings.text: BOARD OF HEALTH PROFESSIONALS
settings.sub-text: Consisting of scientists, researchers, pharmaceutical experts, and health professionals, our board of health professionals continue to challenge and uphold us and our products to the highest standards.

settings.title: What are electrolytes?
settings.answer: Electrolytes are charged ions that conduct electrical activity in our bodies . These minerals are crucial to everyday bodily functions and the principle electrolytes are sodium, potassium, chloride and magnesium.

settings.title: Why are electrolytes important?
settings.answer: Electrolytes are vital nutrients that support whole-body health. From our mood to our muscles and ability to detox, electrolytes play a key role in over 300 enzymatic reactions in our body that benefit daily life.

settings.title: What causes leg cramps?
settings.answer:
Leg cramps are primarily caused by an imbalance of electrolyte and mineral levels, specifically sodium, potassium, chloride and magnesium.

Depleted levels of these electrolytes will increase your risk of leg cramps.

settings.title: How can electrolyte drinks prevent leg cramps?
settings.answer:
Recent studies support electrolyte drinks, and not water alone, are one of the quickest ways to alleviate and prevent leg cramps.

Electrolytes are essential to muscle health and our ability absorb and use water by replacing essential minerals that are easily lost throughout the day, especially when exercising.

Buoy is an easy on-the-go electrolyte boost you can add to any drink.

settings.title: Can I drink electrolyte drinks if I'm not an athlete or workout regularly?
settings.answer:
Yes, electrolytes are for so much more than peak performance.

Staying hydrated with electrolytes supports everything from your mood to your gut health and even your libido.

Buoy is optimized for all-day hydration, whether you're an athlete or not. You'll notice how our brain activating minerals enhance focus and productivity along with stable energy.

settings.title: Are your electrolyte drinks low in sugar?
settings.answer: Buoy electrolyte drops are completely sugar free as well as sweetener free. We're proudly unflavored and unsweetened.

settings.title: Do your electrolyte drinks contain artificial colors or flavors?
settings.answer:
No!

Buoy differentiates its electrolyte drops from other products because of how clean are ingredient sourcing is.

settings.title: How do I know if I'm dehydrated?
settings.answer:
One of the easiest ways to tell if you're dehydrated is by the color of your pee.

The colors of your pee can range from clear to a dark amber. If you're dehydrated, your pee will be a noticeable yellow or amber color.

An additional method to test how hydrated your are is assessing your skin elasticity. Pinch the skin on your wrist and then let go. If your skin takes a second to return to normal, you may be dehydrated.

settings.title: What to do if I'm dehydrated?
settings.answer:
Once dehydrated, water alone is not enough. Drinking an electrolyte-infused beverage is key to replenishing lost electrolyte levels and balancing your fluids.

Buoy's electrolyte drops are a quick, easy way to rehydrate with any beverage you're drinking.

settings.title: Can I drink your electrolyte drinks while pregnant or breastfeeding?
settings.answer:
Yes!

Electrolytes and trace minerals are key nutrients that are essential to all cycles of pregnancy, from pre- to postpartum.

Pregnant and breastfeeding women can significantly benefit by incorporating a clean electrolyte supplement into their diets.

With any new supplement, we always recommend checking with your healthcare team or doctor.

settings.title: Can children drink your electrolyte drinks?
settings.answer:
Yes!

All Buoy electrolyte drops are safe and effective for children.

Buoy contains only essential electrolytes and trace minerals important for every cell and system in our bodies, especially key for children as these nutrients are often missing in our diets.

Other electrolytes contain high sugar and sweetener counts, artifical colors and additives and other inflammatory ingredients.

settings.title: Do your electrolyte drinks contain caffeine?
settings.answer:
Hydration Drops and Immunity Drops do not contain any caffeine.

Only our Energy Drops contain a small amount of caffeine sourced from the potent health compounds in green tea.

settings.title: How long do the effects of your electrolyte drinks last?
settings.answer:
Buoy electrolytes are a great option for short-term relief with their fast-acting, bioavailable form factor. For results within a day or two, you can help prevent leg cramps, headaches, fatigue and more.

Use consistently for transformative, long lasting benefits.

settings.title: Are your electrolyte drinks vegan?
settings.answer:
Yes!

Buoy's electrolytes and minerals are ethically sourced from the ocean and our antioxidants and vitamins are plant-powered.

Our electrolyte drops contain no animal byproduct.

settings.title: Do you offer bulk orders or subscriptions for your drinks?
settings.answer:
Yes!

If you need to stock up, 9 Bottle Packs are available for one-time purchases and subscription to save an additional 24%.

settings.title: What is the shelf life of your electrolyte drinks?
settings.answer:
Buoy electrolyte drops are shelf stable over a year.

After opening, we suggest using within two months.

settings.title: Do you offer any discounts or promotions?
settings.answer:
Unlock 24% off Buoy when you subscribe to monthly deliveries. Your discount and Free Shipping applies to every order. Cancel anytime, even after yoru first order.

If it's not for you, get a full refund.

settings.title: Can I find your drinks in stores?
settings.answer:
Yes! Buoy is nationwide in CVS, Walgreens and boutique natural grocers across the country.

Check our store locator to find the closest stores to you or order directly from our site.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.answer:
Buoy offers a 30 day money back guarantee on all of our products purchased through our website so you can try it risk free in your routine to see if it's a good fit.

If it's not for you, get a full refund no questions asked.
